channel.title: Utopia on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Utopia on My New Hugo Site

item.title: What's Your Gimmick?
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: These days, it seems like TV is all about gimmicks: Think reality shows, TV shows that recap the TV shows that literally just aired, limited series designed to recycle old hit shows, and even live theatre productions like The Wiz. TV executives are like P.T. Barnum-style hucksters, willing to try anything to keep us watching. And it’s always been that way, honestlyâ€”if they can make watching your boob tube into an “event,” they know they’ve sucked you in.
